news.title: Tribal Land Rights and Industrial Development Balance
news.content: Jharkhand High Court establishes framework for balancing tribal land rights with industrial development, ensuring fair compensation and community consent for land acquisition.

news.title: Coal Mining Environmental Compliance
news.content: The court mandates strict environmental compliance for coal mining operations in Jharkhand, including air quality monitoring and rehabilitation of affected areas.

news.title: Rural Healthcare Access Improvement Directives
news.content: Jharkhand High Court directs state government to improve rural healthcare access, particularly for tribal populations, ensuring adequate medical facilities and trained personnel.
